textAfterTable: Johnny Drama is one enterprising fellow, isn't he? Celebrate his latest hit show with the Entourage Viking Quest T-Shirt. It boasts a 100%-cotton construction, is emblazoned with the Viking Quest logo on the front, and features the text "From the past comes a warrior of the future. Starring Johnny Chase." Hell yes! Order your Entourage Viking Quest T-Shirt and defeat all enemies.
